m:properties.d:Title: HRIS
m:properties.d:System_x0020_Description: HR Smart is a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) Shared Service Center (SSC) solution chosen in accordance with the federally mandated eGov initiatives (OMB directive). It has replaced the capabilities of the HR portion of the legacy Personnel and Accounting Integrated Data (PAID) system and will provide additional capabilities in future releases. The HR Smart system supports personnel action processing, benefits management, compensation management, and manager self-service. The system is a Software As A Solution (SAAS), it is hosted by International Business Machines (IBM). Authority To Operate (ATO) was granted in April 2014 for a categorization of Federal Information Management Act (FISMA) at Moderate. The system became operational in April 2015, then had undergone a change in its FISMA categorization to High. The system was successfully transitioned to the business office, Human Resources Information Services (HRIS) for System Ownership, September 2016.
